about_the_game:
In this game, you are a Erotic crepe and sweets seller! The player needs to serve customers according to their orders! Customers don't expect much! They come into the store, place an order, and the player is the salesperson who needs to hit the order sequence before time runs out and you pass the level! Unlock achievements and become the biggest crepe and sweets seller in the world! Be quick! Serve the customers and sell the Erotic candies! As the levels advance, the time to serve customers becomes shorter. Always be quick and memorize the orders! The game contains adult content such as Erotic sweets and sexy characters. The game does not feature themes such as violence, explicit sex and drug/alcohol abuse.

Features and Game Mechanics

- Make combinations of ingredients to make the candies;
- Game mechanics that involve speed and memory, as each customer places a different order;
- The player must use a mouse and keyboard for gameplay;
- Customers' waiting times decrease as levels progress;
- Unlock achievements;
- The difficulty of the game consists of memorizing the orders and being quick in assembling the sweets.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features sexy outfits and crepes in the shape of genitalia.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

name: Pleasure Sweet Secret

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

short_description: A puzzle game, reflexes, and memory to sell crepes and sweets with an erotic theme. The game features iconic characters who will visit your shop and place orders. You must get the ingredients right for the order before the time runs out and the customers leave.
